title: Zoe and Beans. The Magic Hoop
description: Zoe's hoop is no ordinary toy! Zoe has found a fun new game to play! When Beans jumps through her hoop he magically transforms into . . . Beans the rabbit with floppy ears, or Beans the crocodile with snappy jaws! But could Beans the elephant be a jump too far? The hoop may be magic but it's only small—and a great big elephant could easily get stuck.
author: Chloë Inkpen
